## To get in touch with Native Land Digital. 

We are a small team of Indigenous peoples working to update, correct, and validate the information and resources visible on the map. Please take the time to send your correspondence to the correct email address.

<div class="mt-4 nld-text-lg nld-text-teal-500">Due to personnel issues, we've had some trouble responding in a timely way to emails. As a result, if you want to get in touch, we invite you to come to our Discord and ask yours questions there!</div>

  If you’d like to connect and offer your expertise, feel free to join our growing Discord channel. You’ll automatically be added to our #volunteer channel, where you can reach out and get involved.

<div class="border-l-4 nld-border-brown-500 nld-bg-brown-50 p-4 mt-8">
  <div class="uppercase nld-text-brown-500 nld-font-jost nld-font-h5">Upholding Respect</div>

  **Please be aware that our Native Land Digital staff are valued.** Native Land Digital will not accept hate messaging or threats of violence. All forms of correspondence perceived as threatening across Native Land Digital platforms will be reported.
</div>
